class.name: AudioEffectSampleRate
class.brief_description: Adds a sample rate audio effect to an Audio bus. Resamples the original audio signal at a new sample rate.
class.description: Resamples the input audio signal at a new sample rate. Aliasing artifacts are produced in the resulting signal, since no interpolation is applied. [b]Note:[/b] To reduce an audio signal's bit depth, use the "LoFi" mode in [AudioEffectDistortion].

members.member: Linear fade between dry/wet signals. Value can range from [param 0.0] to [param 1.0].
Sample rate (in Hz) that input audio will be resampled to. Value must be at least [param 1.0], and should be less than [method AudioServer.get_mix_rate] to result in any audible effect.
